scripts.android:clear: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn cache clean --force && yarn install
scripts.android:clean: watchman watch-del-all && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.android:reset: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:resetDebug: yarn android:clean && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.debug-apk: yarn android:resetDebug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && open ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug
scripts.release-bundle: yarn android:reset && npx react-native build-android --mode=release && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && watchman watch-del-all && xcodebuild clean && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods build Podfile.lock && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && pod cache clean --all && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install && cd ..
